>>38122372
CG does not have access to unique in game content. Cg has less players then Writ keepers and all their players on both sides are competent. Guild's don't take bad players, maybe not the best but certainly not bad.

As far as the "best" that is strongly debated, they are the fewest and have the most in depth and asinine screening process, but that doesn't equal the best.
